name: Troll Dungeon Survivor
description:
WARNING MILD PIXEL VIOLENCE

This is my third game in my one week game series!

Welcome survivor!

In this game you are one of the last surviving humans. Trolls have risen from the earth and taken over the world. Slay waves of trolls to lure out the King Troll for an epic showdown.

Arm yourself with guns and drink "special" potions to give yourself the edge to survive to the end.

There are 5 different guns, and 3 different potions.

As always every week I'm creating a new game to post here. If you want to follow my journey, you can watch my progress on youtube here: 1 Week Games - YouTube or you can follow my instagram here: Nate Whitehead (@1weekgames) • Instagram photos and videos
